thread.title: BRIEF-Avangrid Q1 GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.79

title: BRIEF-Avangrid Q1 GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.79
text:
05 AM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Avangrid Q1 GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.79 Reuters Staff 
April 23 (Reuters) - Avangrid Inc: 
* AVANGRID REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 EARNINGS RESULTS AND AFFIRMS 2018 EARNINGS OUTLOOK * Q1 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.79 
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.80 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * SEES FY 2018 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.16 TO $2.46 
* AFFIRMS 2018 EARNINGS OUTLOOK OF $2.16-$2.46 ON A U.S. GAAP BASIS AND $2.22-$2.50 ON A NON-U.S. GAAP ADJUSTED BASIS 
* QTRLY OPERATING REVENUES $1,865 MILLION VERSUS $1,758 MILLION * Q1 REVENUE VIEW $1.73 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S 
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $2.38 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
